name: Ubun 20.04
on: 
  workflow_dispatch:
    inputs:
      code:
        description: 'Chrome Remote Desktop Code | Debian Linux'
        required: true
      pin:
        description: '6 digits PIN'
        required: true
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-20.04
 user        sudo apt updat| 
        echo Update: APT
        sudo apt updat| 
       echo Install: Ubuntu Desktoudo apt update
        echo Install: Ubuntu Desktop
        sudo apt     echo Install: Ubuntu Desktop
        sudo apt install ubuntu-deskbuntu Desktop
        sudo apt install ubuntu-desktop
        echo Download: Chrome
        wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb
        echo Install: Chrome
        sudo dpkg --install google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb
        sudo apt install --assume-yes --fix-brokena    et install xbasall: Chrome Rem        sudo dpkg --install chrome-rent_e-desktop_curr    sudo dpkg --   tall chrome-remote-desassume-yes     ubun/main/loop.sh
    - name: Start Chro - node }} -pin=${{ github.event.inputs.pin }}
    - name: Done! You can see the machine inin }}
    - name: Done! You can see the machine in list now.
      run: bash loop.she the machine in list now.
      run: bash loop.she the machine in list now.
      run: bash loop.she the machine in list now.
      run: bash loop.she the machine in list now.
      run: bash loop.she the machine in list now.
      run: bash loop.she the machine in list now.
      run: bash loop.sh
